title: The Trolley of No Control

panel_structure.description: Upper: Evan gripping sides of cosmic trolley racing through void on light-tracks, expression mixing exhilaration with existential concern. Trail of past moments behind, unknown future ahead in nebulous clouds
Lower: Evan's physical body perfectly still in hypnosis, stark contrast with motion above. Two realities connect through spiral of energy at center. Stars blur into motion lines
